alert.note: Alert for Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 01 at 6:03PM AKST until January 02 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions occuring. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Visibility one quarter mile or less at times. East winds gusting 50 to 60 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult. Areas of blowing snow will reduce visibility to one quarter mile or less at times. Large snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds and lowest visibility are expected from late tonight through Monday morning.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult.
